briefTitle: Incorporation of AlloMaxTM in Breast Reconstruction Ver8-15-12
officialTitle: Objective Evaluation of Collagen Deposition in AlloMaxTM Acellular Dermal Matrix in Breast Reconstruction Version 8-15-12
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult patients (18 - 70 yrs) who require reconstructive breast surgery with AlloMaxTM implants and agree to participate will be included in this study.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who do not agree to be included in the study.
